name: Kitty Mage
description:
A platformer about a cat who is a mage! 

-Any key pressed continues to the next screen to start game

-SpaceBar is jump

-up, down, left, right arrow keys to move

-Enter is pause game

Still needs some work done- mainly available for testing, thank you.
